short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens a window into the source.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Defenestration is an English word meaning, "throwing out of a window". This add-on will put into a window any source code of the element you are hovering over. That's it.

The source code is licensed under GPLv3, found at https://github.com/polypmer/fenestrate

The syntax highlighting is done with the 3rd party (BSD-3) library highlight js.
